CustomField.formula:
IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK(Price__c)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Monthly'),Price__c*Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c *(Subscription_License_Term_Months__c- Promotional_Terms_Months__c ), IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Quarterly'),((Price__c* Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c )/3)* (Subscription_License_Term_Months__c- Promotional_Terms_Months__c ), IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Annually'),Price__c* Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c *( (Subscription_License_Term_Months__c- Promotional_Terms_Months__c)/12),Price__c*Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c ))),
MRR__c * Subscription_License_Term_Months__c)
CustomField.label: TCV
